scripts.up:nixinx: npm run clean && npm install && npm run env:use:nixinx && npm run _check:build && npm run git:push && next dev -p 3000
scripts.up:ElPatron: npm run clean && npm install && npm run env:use:ElPatron && npm run _check:build && npm run git:push && next dev -p 3001
scripts.up:HTWindsor: npm run clean && npm install && npm run env:use:HTWindsor && npm run _check:build && npm run git:push && next dev -p 3002
scripts.up:HTLeamington: npm run clean && npm install && npm run env:use:HTLeamington && npm run _check:build && npm run git:push && next dev -p 3003
npm install && npm audit fix && next lint && next build && git status && git add . && (git commit -m "General Adjustments" || echo No changes) && powershell -NoProfile -Command "$b=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); git push -u origin $b" && cls && next dev
scripts.git: git status && git add . && (git commit -m "General Adjustments" || echo No changes) && powershell -NoProfile -Command "$b=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); git push -u origin $b" && cls && next dev
scripts._check:build: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && next build && next-sitemap
scripts.git:push: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$msg=$env:npm_config_msg; if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($msg)){$msg='General Adjustments'}; $b=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); git status; git add -A; git commit -m \"$msg\" 2>$null; git push -u origin $b"
scripts.clean:deep: node -e "const fs=require('fs');for(const p of ['.next','.turbo','node_modules','dist','package-lock.json']){try{fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('removed',p);}catch{}}" && npm install && npm run build:pkg && npm run build:app
scripts.clean:deep:nb: node -e "const fs=require('fs');for(const p of ['.next','.turbo','node_modules','dist','package-lock.json']){try{fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('removed',p);}catch{}}" && npm install
scripts.deploy:nixinx: npm run clean:deep && npm install && npm run env:use:nixinx && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run dev:nixinx
scripts.build:pkg: tsc -p tsconfig.pkg.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.pkg.json && node scripts/copy-css.js
scripts.publish:pkg: npm run clean:deep && npm install && npm run build:pkg && npm publish --access=restricted
scripts.dist: npm run clean:deep && npm run build:pkg
scripts.release:patch: npm run build:pkg && npm version patch && npm publish --access=restricted
scripts.release:minor: npm run build:pkg && npm version minor && npm publish --access=restricted
scripts.release:major: npm run build:pkg && npm version major && npm publish --access=restricted
scripts.all:patch: npm run clean:deep && npm install && npm audit fix && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run release:patch && npm run dev
scripts.all:minor: npm run clean:deep && npm install && npm audit fix && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run release:minor && npm run dev
scripts.all:major: npm run clean:deep && npm install && npm audit fix && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run release:major && npm run dev
scripts.all:ElPatron: npm run clean:deep:nb && npm run env:use:ElPatron && npm audit fix && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push:ElPatron && npm run dev:ElPatron
scripts.all:ElPatron:patch: npm run clean:deep && npm audit fix && npm run env:use:ElPatron && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push --msg=%npm_config_msg% && npm version patch && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run git:push:tags && npm run dev:ElPatron
scripts.all:ElPatron:minor: npm run clean:deep && npm audit fix && npm run env:use:ElPatron && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push --msg=%npm_config_msg% && npm version minor && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run git:push:tags && npm run dev:ElPatron
scripts.all:ElPatron:major: npm run clean:deep && npm audit fix && npm run env:use:ElPatron && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push --msg=%npm_config_msg% && npm version major && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run git:push:tags && npm run dev:ElPatron
scripts.all:HTWindsor: npm run clean:deep:nb && npm run env:use:HTWindsor && npm audit fix && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push:HTWindsor && npm run dev:HTWindsor
scripts.all:HTWindsor:patch: npm run clean:deep && npm audit fix && npm run env:use:HTWindsor && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push --msg=%npm_config_msg% && npm version patch && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run git:push:tags && npm run dev:HTWindsor
scripts.all:HTWindsor:minor: npm run clean:deep && npm audit fix && npm run env:use:HTWindsor && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push --msg=%npm_config_msg% && npm version minor && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run git:push:tags && npm run dev:HTWindsor
scripts.all:HTWindsor:major: npm run clean:deep && npm audit fix && npm run env:use:HTWindsor && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push --msg=%npm_config_msg% && npm version major && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run git:push:tags && npm run dev:HTWindsor
scripts.all:HTLeamington: npm run clean:deep:nb && npm run env:use:HTLeamington && npm audit fix && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push:HTLeamington && npm run dev:HTLeamington
scripts.all:HTLeamington:patch: npm run clean:deep && npm audit fix && npm run env:use:HTLeamington && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push --msg=%npm_config_msg% && npm version patch && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run git:push:tags && npm run dev:HTLeamington
scripts.all:HTLeamington:minor: npm run clean:deep && npm audit fix && npm run env:use:HTLeamington && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push --msg=%npm_config_msg% && npm version minor && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run git:push:tags && npm run dev:HTLeamington
scripts.all:HTLeamington:major: npm run clean:deep && npm audit fix && npm run env:use:HTLeamington && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push --msg=%npm_config_msg% && npm version major && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run git:push:tags && npm run dev:HTLeamington
scripts.all:nixinx: npm run clean:deep:nb && npm run env:use:nixinx && npm audit fix && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push:NIXINX && npm run dev:nixinx
scripts.all:nixinx:patch: npm run clean:deep && npm audit fix && npm run env:use:nixinx && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push --msg=%npm_config_msg% && npm version patch && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run git:push:tags && npm run dev:nixinx
scripts.all:nixinx:minor: npm run clean:deep && npm audit fix && npm run env:use:nixinx && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push --msg=%npm_config_msg% && npm version minor && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run git:push:tags && npm run dev:nixinx
scripts.all:nixinx:major: npm run clean:deep && npm audit fix && npm run env:use:nixinx && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild && npm run build:pkg && npm run git:push --msg=%npm_config_msg% && npm version major && npm publish --access=restricted && npm run git:push:tags && npm run dev:nixinx
scripts.git:push:tags: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$b=(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); git push -u origin $b; git push --tags"
scripts.git:push:NIXINX: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$msg=$env:npm_config_msg; if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($msg)){$msg='General Adjustments'}; git status; git add -A; git commit -m \"$msg\" 2>$null; git push -u origin HEAD:NIXINX"
scripts.git:push:ElPatron: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$msg=$env:npm_config_msg; if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($msg)){$msg='General Adjustments'}; git status; git add -A; git commit -m \"$msg\" 2>$null; git push -u origin HEAD:ElPatron"
scripts.git:push:HTWindsor: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$msg=$env:npm_config_msg; if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($msg)){$msg='General Adjustments'}; git status; git add -A; git commit -m \"$msg\" 2>$null; git push -u origin HEAD:HTWindsor"
scripts.git:push:HTLeamington: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$msg=$env:npm_config_msg; if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($msg)){$msg='General Adjustments'}; git status; git add -A; git commit -m \"$msg\" 2>$null; git push -u origin HEAD:HTLeamington"
